ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: I have been unhappy because of my drug use
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Once or a few times; 2= Once or twice a week; 3= Daily or almost daily

ElementDescription: Because of my drug use, I have lost weight or not eaten properly
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Once or a few times; 2= Once or twice a week; 3= Daily or almost daily

ElementDescription: I have failed to do what is expected of me because of my drug use
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Once or a few times; 2= Once or twice a week; 3= Daily or almost daily

ElementDescription: When using drugs my personality has changed for the worse
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Once or a few times; 2= Once or twice a week; 3= Daily or almost daily

ElementDescription: I have taken foolish risks when I have been using drugs
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Once or a few times; 2= Once or twice a week; 3= Daily or almost daily

ElementDescription: While using drugs, I have said harsh or cruel things to someone
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Once or a few times; 2= Once or twice a week; 3= Daily or almost daily

Notes: 0= Never; 1= Once or a few times; 2= Once or twice a week; 3= Daily or almost daily

Notes: 0= Never; 1= Once or a few times; 2= Once or twice a week; 3= Daily or almost daily

Notes: 0= Never; 1= Once or a few times; 2= Once or twice a week; 3= Daily or almost daily

ElementDescription: SIPDU Average Score
Timepoint/visit label
Within the past week, have you seriously considered attempting suicide?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Suicidal Behavior. Actual Attempt
Notes: 1=Yes; 2=No; -9=incomplete

ElementDescription: Non-suicidal self-harm (cutting, biting, or other means of affect regulation)
Notes: 0 = No;1 = Yes

ElementDescription: Shortened Inventory of Problems-Drug Use Scale Score (sum)
Patient Condition
Notes: 0 = Control; 1 = Self-Affirmation; 2 = Expressive Writing
